channel.title: XUnit on Simon Gilbert Blog
channel.description: Recent content in XUnit on Simon Gilbert Blog

item.title: xUnit "Test Driven" Continuous Integration to Microsoft Azure Web App Services using Appveyor - C# ASP.Net MVC Core
item.description: Continuously deploying via Appveyor CI? Simon Gilbert explains only deploying an Azure Web App Service if all your xUnit tests pass in ASP.Net MVC Core

item.title: Mocking & Testing using Moq & xUnit Frameworks for C# ASP.Net MVC Core
item.description: Keen to take unit testing to the next level? Simon Gilbert walks through the benefits of using the Moq framework combined with xUnit to mock and isolate your unit tests using C# ASP.Net MVC Core in Visual Studio for Mac.

item.title: Basic Unit Testing with xUnit and C# .Net Core in Visual Studio for Mac
item.description: Certain that your code works? Simon Gilbert explains the need for unit testing your C# .Net Core implementations using the xUnit Framework in Visual Studio for Mac.
